item.title: Public Speaking
item.description: Public Speaking: Is it really hard or do you make it harder yourself? Points to be noted while public speaking Make a nice and clear pace. Don’t go too fast or too slow. Take time for audience to make them comprehend your point nice and clear to go. Make a certain dramatic pose when you assert a strong point so that people can clearly understand and appreciate your point. Don’t think too harsh on the subject matter so that you get confused while speaking.
